text: alahimi huletini wenidochi (lekehadina lemi’imeni) misale aderege፡፡ anidenyachewi beminimi negeri layi yemayichili dida newi፡፡ irisumi begetawi layi shekimi newi፡፡ wede yetimi biyazorewi bedegi negeri ayimet’ami፡፡ irisuna ya irisu bek’et’itenawi menigedi layi hono bemasitekakeli yemiyazewi sewi yisitekakelaluni
